item.title: France bans smoking at parks and beaches in effort to protect children
item.description: France over the weekend banned smoking in public parks, on beaches and at bus stops in an effort to protect children.

item.title: Doctors don't get much menopause training. State lawmakers are trying to change that
item.description: The California legislature wants doctors to get more educated about menopause symptoms and treatment. It's one of a number of states passing menopause...

item.title: Why a GOP senator says the budget bill breaks Trump's promise
item.description: The massive budget bill that Senate Republicans are debating pays for some of its tax cuts by slashing hundreds of billions of dollars in Medicaid spe...

item.title: Click, speak, move: These brain implants are poised to help people with disabilities
item.description: People who can no longer move or speak may soon have a new option: an implanted device that links their brain to a computer.

item.title: In effort to protect children, France bans smoking at parks and beaches
item.description: Smokers are no longer allowed to light up in public parks, at swimming pools, or at beaches, or "anywhere children may be present," said French health...
